content:
@Michel Rutten I was entering an Element definition in the Element Tree tab, and while the cursor was still in the Definition field, I clicked the "Element Grid" tab. Upon return, the Eelement Definition field was reset to what it was before my edit. This is reproducable.

Known?
Probably related to focus management, which is not always possible/feasible to fix. Time permitting I'll investigate, but it may take a while to solve this.
I know you are working hard on other important stuff. Thanks in advance for when you get to it.
